root.name: Pang! 3
root.description: Famous classical painting and sculpture are featured as backgrounds and appear in this order : 1. 'La Bohémienne Endormie' by Henri Julien Rousseau, 1897. 2. 'The Scream' by Edvard Munch, 1893. 3. 'Thirty-Six Views of Mt. Fuji' by Katsushika Hokusai, 19th century. 4. 'Still Life - Vase with twelve sunflowers' by Vincent Van Gogh, 1888. 5. 'Les Glaneuses' by Jean Francois Millet, 1857. 6. 'Moulin Rouge - La Goulue' by Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec, 1891. 7. 'Le Dejeuner des Canotiers' by Pierre August Renoir, 1881. 8. 'Portrait of Leopold Zborowski' by Amedeo Modigliani, 1916. 9. 'La Nascita di Venere' by Sandro Filipepi aka 'Botticelli', 1485. 10. 'La Grande Odalisque' by Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres, 1814. 11. 'Mona Lisa' by Leonardo da Vinci, 1506. 12. 'Actor Otani Oniji II as Yakko Edohei' by Toshusai Sharaku, 1794. Credits: Planners : Da., Futoshi Kuwahara, S. Obata (Manhattan) Programmers : Cat, Yoshinobu Inada (Ine), T. Misawa Character designers : Imo, Tom-Pang, S. Kitamura, Ban, Miyo. Artists : Y.N, Akagi, Joe, A. Hamada Music composer : Isao Abe (Oyaji) Sound designers : Toshio Kajino, Hiroaki Kondo Supervisor : Kihaji Okamoto
